original: ekasmiṃ samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma,
analyzed: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma

original: gṛdhrakūṭe mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ dvādaśabhir bhikṣuśatair evaṃ pramukhaiś
analyzed: gṛdhrakūṭe mahatā bhikṣu saṃghena sārdham dvādaśabhiḥ bhikṣu śataiḥ evam pramukhaiḥ
ca aneka mahāśrāvaka ādi bodhisattva bhikṣu bhikṣuṇī upāsikā upāsikā deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kinnara mahoraga manuṣya amanuṣya rāja amātya paura jānapada parivāraiḥ

original: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavāṃś catasṛbhiḥ parṣadbhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ arcanādisaṃskṛtas
analyzed: tena khalu punar samayena bhagavān catasṛbhiḥ parṣadbhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ arcana ādi saṃskṛtaḥ
tadā bodhisattva viṣaya sandarśana praṇidhāna vyūha samādhi viṣaya dhāraṇī sukha vyūha samādhāna nirdeśa caryā vaiśāradya mahā vaipulya bodhisattva anugata sarva buddha parigraha

original: tadā nānāvarṇaraśmayo niścaritāyan prabhābhirayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātun mahatāvabhāsena sphuṭo 'bhūt //
analyzed: tadā nānā varṇa raśmayaḥ niścaritāyan prabhābhiḥ ayam mahatā avabhāsena sphuṭaḥ bhūt

original: atha ratnavairocano nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahānimittaṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā
analyzed: atha ratnavairocanaḥ nāma bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ tam mahā nimittam prātihāryam dṛṣṭvā

original: sahasā sthāyaikāṃśam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya
analyzed: sahasā sthāya eka aṃśam uttarāsaṅgam kṛtvā dakṣiṇa jānu maṇḍalam pṛthivyām pratiṣṭhāpya

original: yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat /
analyzed: yena bhagavān tena añjalim praṇamya bhagavantam etat avocat

original: paramāścaryābhūt tatprāpto 'haṃ bhagavan kuta ime raśmaya āgatāḥ?
analyzed: parama āścaryā abhūt tad prāptaḥ ham bhagavan kutas ime raśmayaḥ āgatāḥ

original: ito buddhakṣetrakoṭīśatasahasragaṅgānadīvālukāsamān buddhakṣetrān atikramya padmā nāma lokadhātu nānāguṇaratnavibhūṣitā nānāratnakūṭāgārādivṛkṣapuṣpakariṇyupaśobhitā
analyzed: itas buddhakṣetra koṭī śata sahasra gaṅgā nadī vālukā samān buddhakṣetrān atikramya padmā nāma lokadhātu nānā guṇa ratna vibhūṣitā nānā ratna kūṭāgāra ādi vṛkṣa puṣpa kariṇī upaśobhitā

original: yatraikajātipratibaddhā bodhisattvāḥ padmottaratathāgataḥ sakāśad dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti /
analyzed: yatra eka jāti pratibaddhāḥ bodhisattvāḥ padmottara tathāgataḥ sakāśat dharmam śṛṇvanti

original: tatra lokadhātau indro nāma mahābodhivṛkṣaratnamayāny asti /
analyzed: tatra lokadhātau indraḥ nāma mahā bodhivṛkṣa ratna mayānī asti
tasya mūle koṭī śata sahasra suvarṇa patra ratna maya padmaḥ sti
tatra ādya rātrau padmottareṇa arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ

original: tatra padmāsananiṣaṇṇā bodhisattvāḥ tasya prātihāryāṇi paśyanti /
analyzed: tatra padmāsana niṣaṇṇāḥ bodhisattvāḥ tasya prātihāryāṇi paśyanti

original: te sarvalokadhātubhyaḥ āgatā bodhisattvās tāṃ pūjayitvā tatra sthitāḥ /
analyzed: te sarva lokadhātubhyaḥ āgatāḥ bodhisattvāḥ tām pūjayitvā tatra sthitāḥ

original: atha padmottaratathāgatas teṣāṃ āśayānuśayaṃ jñātvā bahujanahitāya sukhāya lokānukampāya
analyzed: atha padmottara tathāgataḥ teṣām āśaya anuśayam jñātvā bahu jana hitāya sukhāya loka anukampāya

original: devamanuṣyāṇāñ ca hitāya mahāyānasya paripūraṇārtham avaivartikadharmacakraṃ pravartitavān /
analyzed: deva manuṣyāṇām ca hitāya mahāyānasya paripūraṇa artham a vaivartika dharmacakram pravartitavān

original: bhagavan kiyac ciraṃ sā lokadhātuḥ padmottaras tathāgatas tiṣṭhati saddharmaṃ vā /
analyzed: bhagavan kiyat ciram sā lokadhātuḥ padmottaraḥ tathāgataḥ tiṣṭhati saddharmam vā
bhaviṣyati kula putra padmottarasya tathāgatasya āyuṣpramāṇam triṃśat antara kalpāni

original: ye yatra jātā bodhisattvās teṣāṃ catvāriṃśadantarakalpāyuṣpramāṇaṃ /
analyzed: ye yatra jātāḥ bodhisattvāḥ teṣām catvāriṃśat antara kalpa āyuṣpramāṇam

original: pūrvañ ca kulaputra sā lokadhātuś candanā nāma babhūva /
analyzed: pūrvam ca kula putra sā lokadhātuḥ candanā nāma babhūva

original: na tv evaṃ pariśuddhā nākīrṇaśuddhasattvā yathaitarhi sā lokadhātuḥ /
analyzed: na tu evam pariśuddhā na ākīrṇa śuddha sattvā yathā etarhi sā lokadhātuḥ

original: kulaputra candanāyāṃ lokadhātau candrottamo nāmābhūt tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvat sa cāpi viṃśatyantarakalpān dharmaṃ deśayitavān
analyzed: kula putra candanāyām lokadhātau candrottamaḥ nāma abhūt tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ yāvat sa ca api viṃśati antara kalpān dharmam deśayitavān

original: tasya parinirvāṇakālasamaye cāpy ekatyā bodhisattvāḥ praṇidhānavaśenānyadbuddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāntāḥ /
analyzed: tasya parinirvāṇa kāla samaye ca api ekatyāḥ bodhisattvāḥ praṇidhāna vaśena anyat buddhakṣetram saṃkrāntāḥ
ye ca avaśiṣṭāḥ bodhisattvānām etat abhavat

original: adyarātrau madhyame yāme candrottamas tathāgataḥ parinirvāsyati tasya daśāntarakalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati /
analyzed: adya rātrau madhyame yāme candrottamaḥ tathāgataḥ parinirvāsyati tasya daśa antara kalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati
kaḥ saddharma antardhānasya anantaram anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate

original: tena khalu punaḥ samayena gaganamudro nāma bodhisattvaḥ sa pūrvapraṇidhānena candrottamena tathāgatena vyākṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tena khalu punar samayena gaganamudraḥ nāma bodhisattvaḥ sa pūrva praṇidhānena candrottamena tathāgatena vyākṛtaḥ

original: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ kulaputra mama parinirvṛtasya daśāntarakalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati;
analyzed: bhaviṣyasi tvam kula putra mama parinirvṛtasya daśa antara kalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati
rātryāḥ prathame yāme me saddharma antara hāsyati

original: tatraiva rātryāḥ paścime yāme tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase,
analyzed: tatra eva rātryāḥ paścime yāme tvam anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase
padmottaraḥ nāma bhaviṣyasi tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ

original: tatkāle ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yena candrottamas tathāgatas tenopajagmuḥ /
analyzed: tad kāle ye bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ yena candrottamaḥ tathāgataḥ tena upajagmuḥ

original: upetya te sarve nānāprakārair bodhisattvavikurvaiś candrottamasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā bhagavantam etad avocan /
analyzed: upetya te sarve nānā prakāraiḥ bodhisattva vikurvaiḥ candra uttamasya pūjām kṛtvā bhagavantam etat avocan

original: icchāmo vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavann ime daśāntarakalpā nirodham avahitena cittenātināmayituṃ /
analyzed: icchāmaḥ vayam bhadanta bhagavan ime daśa antara kalpāḥ nirodham avahitena cittena atināmayitum

original: tatra khalu kulaputra candrottamas tathāgato gaganamudraṃ bodhisattvam āmantryaitad avocat /
analyzed: tatra khalu kula putra candrottamaḥ tathāgataḥ gaganamudram bodhisattvam āmantrya etat avocat

original: udgṛhṇa tvaṃ kulaputremaṃ sarvajñātākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ sarvātītānāgatais tathāgataiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair yauvarājyābhiṣiktānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ  #
analyzed: udgṛhṇa tvam kula putra imam sarvajñāta ākāra dhāraṇī mukha praveśam sarva atīta anāgataiḥ tathāgataiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ yauvarājya abhiṣiktānām bodhisattvānām

original: ye caitarhi daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhantas te 'pi deśayanti /
analyzed: ye ca etarhi daśasu dikṣu sarva lokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ tiṣṭhantaḥ te deśayanti

original: ye bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani buddhā bhagavantas te 'pi yauvarājyābhiṣiktabodhisattvānāṃ deśayiṣyanti / tadyathā;
analyzed: ye bhaviṣyanti anāgate dhvani buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ te pi yauvarājya abhiṣikta bodhisattvānām deśayiṣyanti tat yathā

original: jalijalini mahājalini phutke butke saṃmade mahāsaṃmade,
analyzed: jali jalini mahā jalini phutke butke saṃmade mahā saṃmade

original: devām aṭi caṭi ṭake ṭharaṭharkke amimakasi hili cili tili ruruke mahāruruke,
analyzed: devām aṭi caṭi ṭake ṭhara ṭharkke amimakasi hili cili tili ruruke mahāruruke

original: jaya durjaye jaye jayamati śānte śāntanirghoṣaṇi,
analyzed: jaya durjaye jaye jaya mati śānte śānta nirghoṣaṇi

original: ārakṣa dharmavādināṃ caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānām adhimuktipadaprakāśanapadam idaṃ / SjDh_1
analyzed: ārakṣa dharma vādinām caturṇām smṛti upasthānānām adhimukti pada prakāśana padam idam

original: gupte śubhaprabhe tatphale agraphale niṣphale nilaha amukta amukta nirmukte,
analyzed: gupte śubha prabhe tad phale agra phale niṣphale amukta amukta nirmukte
y i v iti ra ti tula
caturṇām pratisaṃvidām adhimukti pada prakāśa padam idam
cakṣuḥ ābhāse nidarśane jñāna āloka nidarśanam ca
caturṇām ṛddhipādānām adhimukti pada prakāśa padam idam

original: some cande datve acala acala apare vicivale nipale pracacale [Page 12] prasare,
analyzed: some cande datve acala acala apare vicivale nipale pracacale page prasare

original: drāme nijaso grakkrame nayane indriyāṇāṃ balānām adhimuktipadaprakāśapadam idaṃ / SjDh_7
analyzed: drāme nijasaḥ grakkrame nayane indriyāṇām balānām adhimukti pada prakāśa padam idam

original: nayasaṃgṛhīte ca yukte succhendena saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānāṃ adhimuktipadaprakāśapadam idaṃ / SjDh_8
analyzed: naya saṃgṛhīte ca yukte succhendena saptānām bodhyaṅgānām adhimukti pada prakāśa padam idam
caturṇām vaiśāradyānām adhimukti pada prakāśa padam idam

original: vartte cakre cakradhare varacakre vare pravare,
analyzed: vartte cakre cakradhare vara cakre vare pravare
cūre mārga nihāra samādhi nihāra prajñā nihāra vimukti nirhāra
vimukti jñāna darśana nihāra nakṣatra nirhāra candra nirhāra sūrya nirhāra
niradbhutam saṃbuddham a buddhaḥ iha buddham
araha daraha paṇḍale page paṇḍale tatra ārtalu

original: bhare bhare bhunde bhire bhire ruṣare,
analyzed: bhare bhare bhunde bhire bhire ruṣare
daśānām balānām adhimukti prakāśana padam idam

original: samanantarārabdhe khalu punar bhagavatāsmiṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśe 'yaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakaṃpitā;
analyzed: samanantara ārabdhe khalu punar bhagavatā asmin sarvajña tā ākāra dhāraṇī mukha praveśe yam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasra lokadhātuḥ ṣaṣ vikāram prakaṃpitā

original: tathāvabhāsena daśasu dikṣu sarve lokadhātavaḥ samapāṇītalajātā sphuṭā saṃdṛśyante /
analyzed: tathā avabhāsena daśasu dikṣu sarve lokadhātavaḥ sama pāṇītala jātā sphuṭā saṃdṛśyante

original: ye 'pi teṣv avasthitāḥ samādhidhāraṇīkṣāntipratilabdhā bodhisattvās tathāgatabalena
analyzed: ye pi teṣu avasthitāḥ samādhi dhāraṇī kṣānti pratilabdhāḥ bodhisattvāḥ tathāgata balena

original: svakasvakeṣu [Page 14] buddhakṣetreṣv antarhitā imāṃ sahālokadhātum āgatvā gṛdhrakūṭe
analyzed: svaka svakeṣu page buddhakṣetreṣu antarhitāḥ imām sahā lokadhātum āgatvā gṛdhrakūṭe

original: bhagavataḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntās tasya pādau śirasā vanditvā nānāprakāraiḥ pūjāṃ
analyzed: bhagavataḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāḥ tasya pādau śirasā vanditvā nānā prakāraiḥ pūjām
kṛtvā tatra eva niṣeduḥ sarvajña tā ākāra dhāraṇī mukha praveśa śravaṇa artham

original: gaṇanāsamatikrāntāś ca devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍamanuṣyakumbhāṇḍapiśācādayas sannipatitās te tatra padmābuddhakṣetraṃ mahatā bodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtaṃ  #
analyzed: gaṇanā samatikrāntāḥ ca deva nāga yakṣa asura garuḍa manuṣya kumbhāṇḍa piśāca ādayaḥ sannipatitāḥ te tatra padmā buddhakṣetram mahatā bodhisattva gaṇa parivṛtam
samanantara udāhṛtasya iyam dhāraṇī mukha praveśasya bhagavatā dvāsaptatibhiḥ gaṅgā nadī vālukā samaiḥ

original: bodhisattvair iyaṃ dhāraṇī pratilabdhā daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātusthāṃ buddhān bhagavataś
analyzed: bodhisattvaiḥ iyam dhāraṇī pratilabdhā daśasu dikṣu sarva lokadhātu sthām buddhān bhagavataḥ

original: te āścaryaprāptā buddhapūjāṃ kṛtvā samādhibalena tasthuḥ /
analyzed: te āścarya prāptāḥ buddha pūjām kṛtvā samādhi balena tasthuḥ

original: imāṃ kulaputra dhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ bodhisattvo bhāvayamānaś caturaśītidhāraṇīśatasahasrāṇi dvāsaptatiś ca ṣaṣṭiñ ca sahasrāṇi pratilabhate  #
analyzed: imām kula putra dhāraṇī mukha praveśam bodhisattvaḥ bhāvayamānaḥ caturaśīti dhāraṇī śata sahasrāṇi dvāsaptatiḥ ca ṣaṣṭim ca sahasrāṇi pratilabhate

original: ye ca māṃ dhāraṇīṃ śroṣyanti te 'vaivartino bhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: ye ca mām dhāraṇīm śroṣyanti te vaivartinaḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: ye likhiṣyanti te buddhadarśanena saddharmaśravaṇena saṅghopasthānenāvirahitā bhaviṣyanti /
analyzed: ye likhiṣyanti te buddha darśanena saddharma śravaṇena saṅgha upasthānena avirahitāḥ bhaviṣyanti
ye likhāpayiṣyanti te anuttareṇa parinirvāṇena avirahitā

original: [Page 15] ye svādhyāyanti teṣāṃ sarvāṇy akarmāni parikṣayaṃ gacchati /
analyzed: page ye su ādhyāyanti teṣām sarvāṇi akarmāni parikṣayam gacchati

original: ye bhāvayanti teṣāṃ pañcānantaryāṇy akarmāni naśyuḥ /
analyzed: ye bhāvayanti teṣām pañca ānantaryāṇi akarmāni naśyuḥ
ye dhārayanti taiḥ pramudita ādi daśa bhūmīn pratilabhante
ye vācayanti te nuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim prāpsyanti

original: ye parebhyaś ca vistareṇa bhāṣayanti te tathāgatā bhavanti //
analyzed: ye parebhyaḥ ca vistareṇa bhāṣayanti te tathāgatāḥ bhavanti

original: atha khalu bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat /
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān maitreyam bodhisattvam etat avocat

original: yaiḥ khalu kulaputrātītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair asyā dhāraṇyāḥ prabhāvena samyaksaṃbodhiḥ prāptāmaḥ /
analyzed: yaiḥ khalu kula putra atīta anāgata pratyutpannaiḥ tathāgataiḥ arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ asyāḥ dhāraṇyāḥ prabhāvena samyaksaṃbodhiḥ prāptāmaḥ

original: mayā bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya sakāśād imān dhāraṇīṃ prāptā,
analyzed: mayā bhūta pūrvam kula putra kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya sakāśāt imān dhāraṇīm prāptā

original: etarhy api mayā dhāritā vācitā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśitā /
analyzed: etarhi api mayā dhāritā vācitā parebhyaḥ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśitā

original: evaṃ khalu maitreya yathā gaganamudrabodhisattvena candrottamatathāgatasya sakāśād imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ prāptā dhāritā vācitā,
analyzed: evam khalu maitreya yathā gaganamudra bodhisattvena candrottama tathāgatasya sakāśāt imām dhāraṇīm prāptā dhāritā vācitā

original: 'syā dhāraṇyāḥ prabhāvena gaganamudro bodhisattvaḥ candrottamatathāgatasya parinirvāṇād
analyzed: syāḥ dhāraṇyāḥ prabhāvena gaganamudraḥ bodhisattvaḥ candrottama tathāgatasya parinirvāṇāt

original: yasyāṃ rātrau prathame yāme saddharmāntarhite tasyāṃ paścime yāme samyaksaṃbodhiṃ
analyzed: yasyām rātrau prathame yāme saddharma antarhite tasyām paścime yāme samyaksaṃbodhim

original: prāptā padmāyāṃ lokadhātau padmottara nāma tathāgato [Page 16] bhavati /
analyzed: prāptā padmāyām lokadhātau padmottara nāma tathāgata upage bhavati

original: tathā kulaputra mama sakāśād iyaṃ drāviḍamantrapadā sarvajñatākāradhāraṇī dhāraya vācaya vistareṇa parebhyaś ca saṃprakāśaya /
analyzed: tathā kula putra mama sakāśāt iyam drāviḍa mantra padā sarvajña tā ākāra dhāraṇī dhāraya vācaya vistareṇa parebhyaḥ ca saṃprakāśaya

original: asyāḥ prabhāvena maitreyāśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ maitreyo nāma tathāgato 'rhaṃ samyaksaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: asyāḥ prabhāvena maitreya aśīti varṣa sahasra āyuṣi prajāyām maitreyaḥ nāma tathāgataḥ rham samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: tena te maitreyaitarhi mamāntikād yauvarājyaṃ parigṛhītaṃ,
analyzed: tena te maitreya etarhi mama antikāt yauvarājyam parigṛhītam

original: yathātītānāṃ tathāgatānām antikād atītair bodhisattvair yauvarājyaṃ parigṛhītāḥ //
analyzed: yathā atītānām tathāgatānām antikāt atītaiḥ bodhisattvaiḥ yauvarājyam parigṛhītāḥ

original: tatra khalu bhagavān sarvāvatīṃ parṣadam avalokya tasyāṃ velāyām imāni mantrapadāny abhāṣata / tadyathā:
analyzed: tatra khalu bhagavān sarvāvatīm parṣadam avalokya tasyām velāyām imāni mantra padāni abhāṣata tat yathā

original: dāntabhūmiḥ damathabhūmiḥ smṛtibhūmiḥ prajñābhūmir vaiśāradyabhūmiḥ pratisaṃvidbhūmir anutkṣepabhūmiḥ samatāparikṣayopekṣabhūmir jātikṣayabhūmir  #
analyzed: dānta bhūmiḥ damatha bhūmiḥ smṛti bhūmiḥ prajñā bhūmiḥ vaiśāradya bhūmiḥ pratisaṃvid bhūmiḥ an utkṣepa bhūmiḥ samatā parikṣaya upekṣa bhūmiḥ jāti kṣaya bhūmiḥ

original: vimati vimati yopahira regamata vasisakrama iticoravate,
makhe mudra daharavate prajñākṣā bubu dahakramitā sadoṣavantaḥ elaya tilaya ahusuṭā amundhamaṃ arthavati,
analyzed: makhe mudra daharavate sa doṣavantaḥ elaya tilaya ahusuṭāḥ arthavati

original: iṭe iṭabale [Page 17] atra tatra kuruṣaṃ laruṣaṃ,
analyzed: iṭe iṭabale page atra tatra kuruṣam laruṣam

original: latatha katha sarvanta sarvantavaḥ aniruddhaḥ dihakhatambi,
analyzed: latatha katha sarvanta sarvantavaḥ aniruddhaḥ dihakhatambi

original: api devānāṃ bhagavāṃ pratītyasamutpādapratisaṃyuktāny adhimuktipadāni prakāśayati,
analyzed: api devānām bhagavām pratītyasamutpāda pratisaṃyuktāni adhimukti padāni prakāśayati

original: eṣu prakāśyamāneṣu ṣaṣṭibhir devanayutaiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam abhūt / SjDh_11
analyzed: eṣu prakāśyamāneṣu ṣaṣṭibhiḥ deva nayutaiḥ satya darśanam kṛtam abhūt

original: ebhir adhimuktipadair daśānāṃ devakoṭīnāṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpāditāni tatraivāvaivartikāḥ sthitāḥ / SjDh_12
analyzed: ebhiḥ adhimukti padaiḥ daśānām deva koṭīnām anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau cittāni utpāditāni tatra eva a vaivartikāḥ sthitāḥ
anumate a kumataḥ a kumati chīdattake

original: ebhir adhimuktipadaiś catuḥṣaṣṭīnāṃ nāgasahasrāṇāṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpāditāni,
analyzed: ebhiḥ adhimukti padaiḥ catuḥṣaṣṭīnām nāga sahasrāṇām anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau cittāni utpāditāni
akṣi hasta saṃkṣi bala asu rodina

original: ebhir adhimuktipadair dvādaśānāṃ yakṣakoṭīnāṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpāditāni tatraivāvaivartikāḥ saṃvṛtāḥ / SjDh_14
analyzed: ebhiḥ adhimukti padaiḥ dvādaśānām yakṣa koṭīnām anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau cittāni utpāditāni tatra eva a vaivartikāḥ saṃvṛtāḥ
gati dhṛti parivāra gati dhṛti lābhīḥ pūrvakeṣu hiteṣu caritavantaḥ
śūravantaḥ cira vīryavantaḥ bhītavantaḥ sita bhāge
mārga mudra diśā apakarṣaṇi kṣapa rahu

original: vāciparikarmaḥ prajñā buddhi smṛti mati [Page 19] gati dhṛti gaṇana pratisaraṇabuddhiḥ,
analyzed: vāci parikarmaḥ prajñā buddhi smṛti mati page gati dhṛti gaṇana pratisaraṇa buddhiḥ

original: ebhir adhimuktipadair ṣaṭpañcāśānām asurasahasrāṇāṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpāditāni avaivartikāś ca vyavasthitāḥ / SjDh_15
analyzed: ebhiḥ adhimukti padaiḥ ṣaṭpañcāśānām asura sahasrāṇām anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau cittāni utpāditāni a vaivartikāḥ ca vyavasthitāḥ
tatra bhagavān vaiśāradya samavasaraṇam bodhisattvam āmantrayate
durlabham kula putra tathāgatānām loke prādurbhāvaḥ
durlabhāḥ ime śīla samādhi prajñā vimukti vimukti jñāna darśana paribhāvita amī drāviḍa mantra padāḥ

original: sattvānāṃ hitāya bodhisattvaguṇaniṣpādanārthaṃ kulaputra tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ
analyzed: sattvānām hitāya bodhisattva guṇa niṣpādana artham kula putra tathāgatena pūrvam bodhisattva caryām

original: caratā dānadamasaṃyamakṣāntivīryasamādhiprajñā parigṛhītā bahavo buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāḥ paryupāsitāḥ,
analyzed: caratā dāna dama saṃyama kṣānti vīrya samādhi prajñā parigṛhītā bahavaḥ buddha koṭī nayuta śata sahasrāḥ paryupāsitāḥ
bahu aprameyam vividha nānā prakāraiḥ śubha karma kṛtam
yena etarhi mayā anuttaram jñānam pratilabdham

original: anekāṃ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṃ tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāñ caratā,
analyzed: anekām kalpa koṭī nayuta śata sahasrām tathāgatena pūrvam bodhisattva caryām caratā
mṛṣā paiśunya paruṣa saṃbhinna pralāpā varjitā
anekavidham kuśalam vāc karmam sevitam bahulīkṛtam
na hi kula putra tathāgata ārhata anyathā kathayanti
atha bhagavān tatra ṛddhi abhisaṃskāram akārṣīt
tena ṛddhi abhisaṃskāreṇa sarva puṇya samavasaraṇam samādhim samāpannaḥ

original: mukhāc ca jihvendriyaṃ nirṇāmayitvā svaṃ mukhaṃ pracchādya tasmāj jihvendriyāt ṣaṣṭiraśmikoṭyo
analyzed: mukhāt ca jihvā indriyam nirṇāmayitvā svam mukham pracchādya tasmāt jihvā indriyāt ṣaṣṭi raśmi koṭyāḥ

original: pramuktās taiś cāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātur udāreṇāvabhāsena nirayatiryagyoniyamalokadevamanuṣyāḥ sphuṭā babhūvuḥ /
analyzed: pramuktāḥ taiḥ ca ayam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasra lokadhātuḥ udāreṇa avabhāsena niraya tiryagyoni yama loka deva manuṣyāḥ sphuṭāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: te ca raśmayo ye nairayikāḥ sattvā agninā prajvalitagātrā dahyante teṣāṃ śītalā vāyavo vānti,
analyzed: te ca raśmayaḥ ye nairayikāḥ sattvāḥ agninā prajvalita gātrāḥ dahyante teṣām śītalāḥ vāyavaḥ vānti

original: yeṣāṃ spṛṣṭānāṃ tanmuhūrtaṃ sukhā vedanā prādurbabhūva /
analyzed: yeṣām spṛṣṭānām tat muhūrtam sukhā vedanā prādurbabhūva

original: ekaikasya ca nairayikasya purataḥ buddhanirmitaṃ tiṣṭhati dvātriṃśadbhir lakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛta aśītibhiś ca,
analyzed: ekaikasya ca nairayikasya puratas buddha nirmitam tiṣṭhati dvātriṃśadbhiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛta aśītibhiḥ ca

original: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā te nairayaikāḥ sukhasamarpitā buddhadarśanāpyāyitaśarīrā buddhaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ cintayanto,
analyzed: yam dṛṣṭvā te nairaya ekāḥ sukha samarpitāḥ buddha darśana āpyāyita śarīrāḥ buddham dṛṣṭvā evam cintayantaḥ
sya sattvasya anubhāvena asmābhiḥ sukhā vedanā pratilabdhā
te bhagavataḥ sakāśe prema aprasāda gauravam saṃjanayanti

original: namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya,
analyzed: namaḥ buddhāya namaḥ dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya

original: tatas te nairayikās sattvā añjaliṃ pragṛhya vācam udīrayanti,
analyzed: tatas te nairayikāḥ sattvāḥ añjalim pragṛhya vācam udīrayanti

original: namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya /
analyzed: namaḥ buddhāya namaḥ dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya

original: atha te sattvās tena cittaprasādakuśalamūlena tataś cyavitvā ekatyā deveṣūpapannā ekatyā manuṣyeṣu,
analyzed: atha te sattvāḥ tena citta prasāda kuśala mūlena tatas cyavitvā ekatyāḥ deveṣu upapannāḥ ekatyāḥ manuṣyeṣu

original: ye śītanārakāṃ sattvāḥ pretāḥ piśācā vā sukhasamarpitā devamanuṣyeṣūpapannā evaṃ devamanuṣyatiryakṣu lokeṣu raśmayas saṃcodanti /
analyzed: ye śīta nārakām sattvāḥ pretāḥ piśācāḥ vā sukha samarpitāḥ deva manuṣyeṣu upapannāḥ evam deva manuṣya tiryakṣu lokeṣu raśmayaḥ saṃcodanti

original: gaṇanātikrāntā devamanuṣyā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya niṣaṇṇā karuṇāpuṇḍarīka nāma mahāyānasūtradharmaśravaṇāya
analyzed: gaṇanā atikrāntāḥ deva manuṣyāḥ bhagavat sakāśam upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā abhivandya niṣaṇṇā karuṇāpuṇḍarīka nāma mahāyāna sūtra dharma śravaṇāya

original: tena ca samayena gaṇanātikrāntā devamanuṣyakāyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpādayām āsuḥ /
analyzed: tena ca samayena gaṇanā atikrāntāḥ deva manuṣya kāyāḥ anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau cittāni utpādayām āsuḥ
gaṇanā atikrāntāḥ ca atra bodhisattvāḥ samādhi kṣānti dhāraṇīḥ pratilabdhavantaḥ

original: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanā sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan //
analyzed: idam avocat bhagavān ātta manāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣad sa deva mānuṣa asura garuḍa gandharvaḥ ca lokaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāṣitam abhyanandan
iti ārya śrī karuṇāpuṇḍarīka mahāyāna sūtre iyam sarvajña tā ākāra dhāraṇī samāptā
